text:
[Verse]
Stars above they start to shine
Nighttime whispers feel so fine
Moonlight dancing on the waves
Dreams like whispers they behave

[Verse 2]
Shadows playing hide and seek
Magic moments we will keep
Eyes are closed but heart's awake
Feel the love with every shake

[Chorus]
Let the night carry you high
Twilight dreams touch the sky
Every heartbeat pulse divine
In this world you're mine

[Verse 3]
Neon lights they paint the town
Silent whispers all around
Melodies in looping flow
Sing the love we only know

[Bridge]
Hold on tight never let go
In the night let it just flow
We are more than what it seems
Living in our twilight dreams

[Verse 4]
Distant stars they guide our way
Till the dawn and break of day
In your arms where I belong
Sing with me this twilight song
title: Twilight Dreams
